filmography.title: She Done Him Wrong
filmography.role_description: A handsome Salvation Army captain who unwittingly catches the eye of a bawdy nightclub singer involved in criminal activities.
filmography.plot: A seductive nightclub singer contends with several suitors, including a jealous escaped convict and a handsome young temperance league member.

filmography.title: The Awful Truth
filmography.role_description: A sophisticated husband who, after a mutual misunderstanding leads to divorce, does everything in his power to sabotage his ex-wife's new engagement.
filmography.plot: A married couple files for divorce, but before their decree becomes final, they do their best to ruin each other's plans for remarriage.

filmography.title: Bringing Up Baby
filmography.role_description: A mild-mannered, bespectacled paleontologist whose life is turned upside down by a flighty heiress and her pet leopard.
filmography.plot: While trying to secure a $1 million donation for his museum, a befuddled paleontologist is pursued by a flighty and often irritating heiress and her pet leopard, Baby.

filmography.title: Holiday
filmography.role_description: A free-spirited self-made man who becomes engaged to a wealthy socialite, only to find he has more in common with her non-conformist sister.
filmography.plot: A young man falls in love with a girl from a rich family, but finds his unorthodox plan to go on a holiday for the early years of his life meets with skepticism by everyone except his fiancée's eccentric sister.

filmography.title: Gunga Din
filmography.role_description: A treasure-hunting British Army sergeant in colonial India who teams up with a native water bearer to stop a murderous cult.
filmography.plot: Three British soldiers and a native water bearer must stop a secret revival of the murderous Thuggee cult in India.

filmography.title: Only Angels Have Wings
filmography.role_description: The tough, unsentimental head of an air freight service in the Andes who risks his life and the lives of his pilots to deliver the mail.
filmography.plot: At a remote South American trading port, the manager of an air freight company is forced to risk his pilots' lives in order to win a contract.

filmography.title: His Girl Friday
filmography.role_description: A ruthless, fast-talking newspaper editor who uses every trick in the book to keep his star reporter ex-wife from remarrying and leaving the paper.
filmography.plot: A newspaper editor uses every trick in the book to keep his ace reporter ex-wife from remarrying.

filmography.title: My Favorite Wife
filmography.role_description: A man who has just remarried after his first wife was declared dead, only to have her return on the day of his honeymoon.
filmography.plot: A woman who has been missing for seven years and declared legally dead returns home on the day her husband is marrying another woman.

filmography.title: The Philadelphia Story
filmography.role_description: The charming, wealthy ex-husband of a socialite who returns on the eve of her wedding to help—and torment—her.
filmography.plot: When a rich woman's ex-husband and a reporter turn up just before her planned remarriage, she begins to learn the truth about herself.

filmography.title: Penny Serenade
filmography.role_description: A newspaper reporter whose marriage is tested by tragedy and the emotional trials of adopting and raising a child.
filmography.plot: A couple looks back on their past as they prepare to go their separate ways, recalling their courtship, marriage, and the death of their child.

filmography.title: Suspicion
filmography.role_description: A charming but irresponsible playboy whose new wife begins to suspect that he is a murderer planning to kill her for insurance money.
filmography.plot: A shy young heiress marries a charming gentleman, and soon begins to suspect he is planning to murder her.

filmography.title: The Talk of the Town
filmography.role_description: A political activist wrongly accused of arson who hides out in the home of a spirited schoolteacher and her distinguished law professor tenant.
filmography.plot: An escaped prisoner and a law professor contend for the hand of a spirited schoolteacher.

filmography.title: Destination Tokyo
filmography.role_description: The dedicated commander of a US Navy submarine sent on a dangerous secret mission into Tokyo Bay to gather intelligence.
filmography.plot: A submarine is sent on a secret mission to the very shores of Japan to gather information for the Doolittle Air Raid.

filmography.title: Arsenic and Old Lace
filmography.role_description: A drama critic who discovers on his wedding day that his sweet elderly aunts are homicidal maniacs who poison lonely old men.
filmography.plot: A drama critic learns on his wedding day that his beloved maiden aunts are homicidal maniacs, and that insanity runs in his family.

filmography.title: None But the Lonely Heart
filmography.role_description: A restless Cockney drifter who tries to care for his dying mother while getting pulled into the criminal underworld.
filmography.plot: A Cockney drifter returns home to help his ailing mother run her shop, but gets involved with a gangster.

filmography.title: Notorious
filmography.role_description: A cold, professional government agent who recruits a woman to spy on Nazis in South America, hiding his deep love for her behind a mask of indifference.
filmography.plot: A woman is asked to spy on a group of Nazi friends in South America. How far will she have to go to ingratiate herself with them?

filmography.title: The Bachelor and the Bobby-Soxer
filmography.role_description: A suave artist who is court ordered to date a teenage girl who has a crush on him, much to the amusement of her older sister.
filmography.plot: A high school girl falls for a playboy artist, and the judge who is her older sister orders him to date her so that she will see the error of her ways.

filmography.title: The Bishop's Wife
filmography.role_description: A charming and elegant angel sent to Earth to help a beleaguered bishop regain his faith and save his marriage.
filmography.plot: An angel in human form enters the life of a bishop in order to help him build a new cathedral and repair his fractured marriage.

filmography.title: Mr. Blandings Builds His Dream House
filmography.role_description: A harried advertising executive who decides to escape the city and build a country home, only to face endless construction nightmares.
filmography.plot: A man and his wife decide to move from their tiny New York apartment to the country, where they try to build a home of their own.

filmography.title: I Was a Male War Bride
filmography.role_description: A French Army officer who marries an American WAC and must navigate ridiculous military bureaucracy to accompany her back to the U.S.
filmography.plot: A French captain marries an American lieutenant and, in order to accompany her back to the US, is forced to pass himself off as a war bride.

filmography.title: Monkey Business
filmography.role_description: A strait-laced chemist who accidentally drinks a youth potion mixed by a chimpanzee, regressing to a wild and uninhibited teenager.
filmography.plot: A chemist finds his personal and professional life turned upside down when one of his chimpanzees finds the fountain of youth.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Nomination – Best Actress (Ginger Rogers)

filmography.title: To Catch a Thief
filmography.role_description: A retired cat burglar known as 'The Cat' who must catch a copycat thief on the French Riviera to clear his name.
filmography.plot: A retired jewel thief sets out to prove his innocence after being suspected of returning to his former occupation.

filmography.title: An Affair to Remember
filmography.role_description: A notorious playboy who meets a woman on a transatlantic cruise and agrees to meet her at the Empire State Building in six months if they still love each other.
filmography.plot: A couple falls in love and agrees to meet in six months at the Empire State Building - but will it happen?

filmography.title: Indiscreet
filmography.role_description: A wealthy diplomat who pretends to be married to avoid commitment, until he falls for a famous actress who discovers his secret.
filmography.plot: An American diplomat in London falls in love with a famous actress, but he pretends to be married to avoid marriage.

filmography.title: Houseboat
filmography.role_description: A government attorney struggling to raise his three children alone who hires a socialite posing as a maid to help him.
filmography.plot: A widower hires a housekeeper to help him raise his three children, unaware that she is a socialite running away from her father.

filmography.title: North by Northwest
filmography.role_description: A suave advertising executive who is mistaken for a government agent by foreign spies and pursued across the country.
filmography.plot: A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies.

filmography.title: Operation Petticoat
filmography.role_description: A submarine commander determined to get his damaged sub back into action, forced to accept a con artist supply officer and a group of army nurses.
filmography.plot: During World War II, a submarine commander finds himself stuck with a pink submarine, a con man executive officer, and a group of army nurses.

filmography.title: The Grass Is Greener
filmography.role_description: An English aristocrat who must win back his wife after she falls for a brash American millionaire visiting their stately home.
filmography.plot: A British Earl fights to save his marriage after an American millionaire falls for his wife.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Nomination – Best Motion Picture (Comedy)

filmography.title: That Touch of Mink
filmography.role_description: A wealthy businessman who tries to seduce an old-fashioned working girl with a luxurious trip to Bermuda, but finds her morals difficult to overcome.
filmography.plot: A rich businessman attempts to seduce a working girl, but she insists on marriage.

filmography.title: Charade
filmography.role_description: A mysterious man with multiple identities who helps a widow in Paris evade men seeking her late husband's stolen fortune.
filmography.plot: Romance and suspense ensue in Paris as a woman is pursued by several men who want a fortune her murdered husband had stolen. Who can she trust?
filmography.awards: BAFTA: Win – Best British Actress (Audrey Hepburn)

filmography.title: Father Goose
filmography.role_description: A drunken, unshaven beach bum coerced into spotting planes for the Navy in WWII, who ends up protecting a French schoolmistress and her students.
filmography.plot: During World War II, a man creates a shelter on an island for a teacher and seven students, while falling in love.
